# PDFPrintScalingMode.pageScaleToFit

**Case**

Scale each page up or down to best fit the paper size.

## Declaration

```swift
case pageScaleToFit
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **PDFPrintScalingMode.pageScaleDownToFit**: Scale large pages down to fit the paper size (smaller pages do not get scaled up).
- **PDFPrintScalingMode.pageScaleNone**: Do not apply scaling to the page when printing.
